mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_COMBO WHERE CO_ID = #{ id}
mapper.select: SELECT ITS.ITS_ID,ITS.ITS_NAME,ITS.ITS_PRICE,IT.IT_NAME FROM T_ITEMS ITS LEFT JOIN T_ITEMS_ITEM_LINK IIL ON ITS.ITS_ID = IIL.IIL_ITS_ID LEFT JOIN T_ITEM IT ON IT.IT_ID = IIL.IIL_IT_ID LEFT JOIN T_COMBO_ITEMS_LINK CIL ON CIL.CIL_ITS_ID = ITS.ITS_ID
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_COMBO.NEXTVAL AS comboId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO T_COMBO VALUES(#{comboId},#{comboName},#{comboPrice},#{comboState},NULL,SYSDATE,SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CO_NAME FROM T_COMBO WHERE CO_NAME=#{comboName}
SELECT CIL_ITS_ID FROM T_COMBO_ITEMS_LINK WHERE CIL_CO_ID=#{comboId}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_COMBO SET CO_NAME=#{comboName} , CO_PRICE=#{price},CO_UPDATE_TIME=SYSDATE WHERE CO_ID=#{comboId}
